properties.name: kstry.story.tracking.log
properties.description: 是否打印链路追踪，默认：false

properties.name: kstry.story.tracking.value-max-length
properties.description: 监控中节点出入参快照最大长度，超出将进行截取。默认为 -1 代表不限制， 0 时不记录入参， >0 时会对节点出入参快照截取到该字段长度。仅在 TrackingTypeEnum == SERVICE_DETAIL 时生效

properties.name: kstry.story.define-node-params
properties.description: 允许流程配置中指定服务节点入参，默认：true

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.core-size
properties.description: Kstry 线程池核心线程数，默认：Math.max(Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors(), 2)

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.max-size
properties.description: Kstry 线程池最大线程数，默认：Math.max(Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors(), 2) * 2

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.keep-alive-time
properties.description: Kstry 线程池空闲线程等待时间，单位：分钟，默认：10

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.queue-size
properties.description: Kstry 线程池缓存队列长度，默认：2000

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.monitor.delay
properties.description: 线程监控日志打印间隔时间，默认 10s

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.monitor.enable
properties.description: 是否开启线程池监控，进行日志打印，默认：true

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.shutdown-await
properties.description: Thread Pool shutdown 之后的等待时间，单位：ms，默认：3000

properties.name: kstry.thread.pool.shutdown-now-await
properties.description: Thread Pool shutdown 失败之后，再 shutdownNow 之后的等待时间，单位：ms，默认：5000
